thread.title: Street Closures in JOMO - October 20th
thread.title_full: Street Closures in JOMO - October 20th - FOX 14 TV Joplin and Pittsburg News Weather Sports |

author: News Release
title: Street Closures in JOMO - October 20th
text:
JOPLIN, MISSOURI - Starting Tuesday, October 20, 2015 thru Thursday, October 22, 2015.
There will be a road closure on Murphy Blvd from 4th Street to 7TH Street due to a sinkhole. City crews hope to have the road opened by Thursday evening.
There will also a lane closure at 20th & Joplin. The southbound lane will be closed due a sinkhole. City crews hope to have the road opened by Wednesday evening.
Detours will be in place. Drivers are urged to use extreme caution in this area.
If you have any questions, please call the Engineering Department at 624-0820, ext. 530.
